Detailed Description

This class provides an implementation of IFileSystem that reads from a zip file.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Empty zip system, doesnt load anything.

Constructor.

Used for zip files nested in zip files.

Parameters:

BinaryPtr ZipFileSystem::createZip (  ) 

Builds a zip file and returns it as a binary block.

[local file header 1] [file data 1] [local file header n] [file data n] [central directory] [end of central directory record]

Returns:
The file structure in a binary block.

int ZipFileSystem::fileIndex ( const std::string &  name  ) 

This method returns the index associated with a file name.

If the file has duplicate names, it will get the first entry available.

Parameters:
name Name of the file.
Returns:
The index associated with the name, -1 if it doesnt exist.

FILE * ZipFileSystem::posixFileOpen ( const std::string &  path,
const char *  mode 
) [virtual]

This method opens a file using POSIX semantics.

It first extracts the file from the Zip file, and then saves it to a temporary file

Parameters:
path Path relative to the base of the filesystem.
mode The mode that the file should be opened in.
Returns:
True if successful

Reimplemented from IFileSystem.

Returns:
